official_title: A joint resolution to designate April 24, 1985, as "National Day of Remembrance of Man's Inhumanity to Man".

summary.text: Designates April 24, 1985, as a National Day of Remembrance of Man's Inhumanity to Man (especially for remembering the Armenian genocide in Turkey).
